name: 428: Shibuya Scramble
descr: 关于这款游戏A kidnapping on the streets of Shibuya brings together a hot-blooded detective, hard-hitting journalist, former gang leader, the head researcher of a big pharma manufacturer and a part-timer stuck in cat costume for a series of events each more unexpected and outrageous than the last. Can they—or the city itself—make it through the day?Game FeaturesReal Actors and Locations428: Shibuya Scrambleuses a mix of still photography and live action footage for a cinematic gaming experience that pulls you on a whirlwind tour of downtown Tokyo.Tangled FatesAn innocent choice by one character can have disastrous consequences for another. Unravel the narrative threads, discover how they tie together and use the JUMP system to move between scenarios as five stories run in parallel.Easter Egg HuntSometimes the wrong decision can lead to the right outcome, or at least an amusing game over. With over 50 endings, multiple bonus modes and extra scenarios, there’s more to the city than there seems.
detail:
名称: 428: Shibuya Scramble
类型: 冒险
开发商: Spike Chunsoft Co., Ltd., Abstraction Games
发行商: Spike Chunsoft Co., Ltd.
发行日期: 2018 年 9 月 4 日
review: 最近评测: 特别好评 (211) - 过去 30 天内的 211 篇用户评测中有 94% 为好评。
全部评测: 好评如潮 (2,378) - 此游戏的 2,378 篇用户评测中有 95% 为好评。
全部评测: 好评如潮 (2,378 篇中的 95%) 发布至今
最近评测: 特别好评 (211 篇中的 94%) 最近

Windows
最低配置:
操作系统 *: Windows 7
处理器: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3470 or better
内存: 4 GB RAM
显卡: OpenGL 3.2 or DirectX 9.0c compatible GPU with at least 1GB of VRAM
存储空间: 需要 6 GB 可用空间

*
2024 年 1 月 1 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将仅支持 Windows 10 及更新版本。
